CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON , the GPE region .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( Краснолуцький міський суд PERSON області ) gave CARDINAL judgments in favour of the applicant against ORG ( ДВАТ Шахта „ Краснолуцька ” ДП ДХК LOC ” ) . By these judgments the court awarded the applicant ORG CARDINAL in salary arrears and QUANTITY of coal , respectively . The judgments became final and the enforcement writs were transferred to ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби ORG міського управління юстиції ) for enforcement .

CARDINAL . On DATE the judgment awarding the applicant salary arrears was enforced in full . The judgment awarding the applicant coal has been partly enforced . To present day the applicant has received QUANTITY of coal . In accordance to the Government , the enforcement is impeded by the debtor 's economic hardships .
CARDINAL . A description of the relevant domestic law can be found in ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
